```diff
+ import { createRouter, createWebHistory } from 'vue-router'
+ 
+ const routes = [
+   {
+     path: '/',
+     name: 'Home',
+     component: () => import('../views/Home.vue')
+   },
+   {
+     path: '/login',
+     name: 'Login',
+     component: () => import('../views/Login.vue')
+   },
+   {
+     path: '/register',
+     name: 'Register',
+     component: () => import('../views/Register.vue')
+   },
+   {
+     path: '/video/:id',
+     name: 'VideoDetail',
+     component: () => import('../views/VideoDetail.vue')
+   },
+   {
+     path: '/member',
+     name: 'MemberCenter',
+     component: () => import('../views/MemberCenter.vue'),
+     meta: { requiresAuth: true }
+   },
+   {
+     path: '/admin',
+     name: 'Admin',
+     component: () => import('../views/admin/AdminLayout.vue'),
+     meta: { requiresAuth: true, requiresAdmin: true },
+     children: [
+       {
+         path: 'dashboard',
+         name: 'AdminDashboard',
+         component: () => import('../views/admin/Dashboard.vue')
+       },
+       {
+         path: 'users',
+         name: 'UserManagement',
+         component: () => import('../views/admin/UserManagement.vue')
+       },
+       {
+         path: 'videos',
+         name: 'VideoManagement',
+         component: () => import('../views/admin/VideoManagement.vue')
+       },
+       {
+         path: 'statistics',
+         name: 'Statistics',
+         component: () => import('../views/admin/Statistics.vue')
+       }
+     ]
+   }
+ ]
+ 
+ const router = createRouter({
+   history: createWebHistory(),
+   routes
+ })
+ 
+ // è·¯ç”±å®ˆå«
+ router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+   const isAuthenticated = localStorage.getItem('token')
+   const isAdmin = localStorage.getItem('isAdmin') === 'true'
+ 
+   if (to.meta.requiresAuth && !isAuthenticated) {
+     next('/login')
+   } else if (to.meta.requiresAdmin && !isAdmin) {
+     next('/')
+   } else {
+     next()
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ export default router 
```

```diff
- 
+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+ import { ref } from 'vue'
+ import axios from 'axios'
+ 
+ export const useUserStore = defineStore('user', () => {
+   const user = ref(null)
+   const token = ref(localStorage.getItem('token') || '')
+   const isAdmin = ref(localStorage.getItem('isAdmin') === 'true')
+ 
+   const login = async (credentials) => {
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.post('/api/auth/login', credentials)
+       token.value = response.data.token
+       user.value = response.data.user
+       isAdmin.value = response.data.user.isAdmin
+       
+       localStorage.setItem('token', token.value)
+       localStorage.setItem('isAdmin', isAdmin.value)
+       
+       return true
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Login failed:', error)
+       return false
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   const register = async (userData) => {
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.post('/api/auth/register', userData)
+       return response.data
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Registration failed:', error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   const logout = () => {
+     user.value = null
+     token.value = ''
+     isAdmin.value = false
+     localStorage.removeItem('token')
+     localStorage.removeItem('isAdmin')
+   }
+ 
+   const checkAuth = async () => {
+     if (!token.value) return false
+     
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.get('/api/auth/me', {
+         headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token.value}` }
+       })
+       user.value = response.data
+       return true
+     } catch (error) {
+       logout()
+       return false
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   return {
+     user,
+     token,
+     isAdmin,
+     login,
+     register,
+     logout,
+     checkAuth
+   }
+ }) 
```

```diff
- 
+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+ import { ref } from 'vue'
+ import axios from 'axios'
+ 
+ export const useVideoStore = defineStore('video', () => {
+   const videos = ref([])
+   const currentVideo = ref(null)
+   const watchHistory = ref([])
+   const watchProgress = ref({})
+ 
+   const fetchVideos = async () => {
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.get('/api/videos')
+       videos.value = response.data
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Failed to fetch videos:', error)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   const getVideoById = async (id) => {
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.get(`/api/videos/${id}`)
+       currentVideo.value = response.data
+       return response.data
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Failed to fetch video:', error)
+       return null
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   const updateWatchProgress = async (videoId, progress) => {
+     try {
+       await axios.post(`/api/videos/${videoId}/progress`, { progress })
+       watchProgress.value[videoId] = progress
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Failed to update watch progress:', error)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   const getWatchHistory = async () => {
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.get('/api/videos/history')
+       watchHistory.value = response.data
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Failed to fetch watch history:', error)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   const downloadVideo = async (videoId) => {
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.get(`/api/videos/${videoId}/download`, {
+         responseType: 'blob'
+       })
+       const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response.data]))
+       const link = document.createElement('a')
+       link.href = url
+       link.setAttribute('download', `${videoId}.mp4`)
+       document.body.appendChild(link)
+       link.click()
+       link.remove()
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Failed to download video:', error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   return {
+     videos,
+     currentVideo,
+     watchHistory,
+     watchProgress,
+     fetchVideos,
+     getVideoById,
+     updateWatchProgress,
+     getWatchHistory,
+     downloadVideo
+   }
+ }) 
```

```diff
- 
+ import axios from 'axios'
+ import { useUserStore } from '../stores/user'
+ 
+ const api = axios.create({
+   baseURL: '/api',
+   timeout: 10000
+ })
+ 
+ // è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+ api.interceptors.request.use(
+   (config) => {
+     const userStore = useUserStore()
+     if (userStore.token) {
+       config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${userStore.token}`
+     }
+     return config
+   },
+   (error) => {
+     return Promise.reject(error)
+   }
+ )
+ 
+ // å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+ api.interceptors.response.use(
+   (response) => {
+     return response.data
+   },
+   (error) => {
+     if (error.response?.status === 401) {
+       const userStore = useUserStore()
+       userStore.logout()
+     }
+     return Promise.reject(error)
+   }
+ )
+ 
+ export const auth = {
+   login: (credentials) => api.post('/auth/login', credentials),
+   register: (userData) => api.post('/auth/register', userData),
+   getProfile: () => api.get('/auth/me')
+ }
+ 
+ export const video = {
+   getList: () => api.get('/videos'),
+   getDetail: (id) => api.get(`/videos/${id}`),
+   updateProgress: (id, progress) => api.post(`/videos/${id}/progress`, { progress }),
+   getHistory: () => api.get('/videos/history'),
+   download: (id) => api.get(`/videos/${id}/download`, { responseType: 'blob' })
+ }
+ 
+ export const member = {
+   getInfo: () => api.get('/member/info'),
+   updateInfo: (data) => api.put('/member/info', data),
+   getOrders: () => api.get('/member/orders'),
+   createOrder: (data) => api.post('/member/orders', data)
+ }
+ 
+ export const admin = {
+   getDashboard: () => api.get('/admin/dashboard'),
+   getUsers: (params) => api.get('/admin/users', { params }),
+   updateUser: (id, data) => api.put(`/admin/users/${id}`, data),
+   deleteUser: (id) => api.delete(`/admin/users/${id}`),
+   getVideos: (params) => api.get('/admin/videos', { params }),
+   createVideo: (data) => api.post('/admin/videos', data),
+   updateVideo: (id, data) => api.put(`/admin/videos/${id}`, data),
+   deleteVideo: (id) => api.delete(`/admin/videos/${id}`),
+   getStatistics: (params) => api.get('/admin/statistics', { params })
+ }
+ 
+ export default api 
```

```diff
- 
+ <template>
+   <div class="video-detail">
+     <el-container>
+       <el-header>
+         <nav-header />
+       </el-header>
+       
+       <el-main>
+         <el-row :gutter="20">
+           <el-col :span="16">
+             <div class="video-player">
+               <video-player
+                 ref="videoPlayer"
+                 :options="playerOptions"
+                 @timeupdate="onTimeUpdate"
+                 @ended="onVideoEnded"
+               />
+               
+               <div class="video-info">
+                 <h1>{{ video?.title }}</h1>
+                 <div class="video-meta">
+                   <span>ä¸Šä¼ æ—¶é—´ï¼š{{ formatDate(video?.createdAt) }}</span>
+                   <span>è§‚çœ‹æ¬¡æ•°ï¼š{{ video?.views }}</span>
+                   <span>æ—¶é•¿ï¼š{{ video?.duration }}</span>
+                 </div>
+                 <div class="video-actions">
+                   <el-button type="primary" @click="toggleLike">
+                     <el-icon><star /></el-icon>
+                     {{ isLiked ? 'å·²æ”¶è—' : 'æ”¶è—' }}
+                   </el-button>
+                   <el-button type="success" @click="downloadVideo" v-if="isMember">
+                     <el-icon><download /></el-icon>
+                     ä¸‹è½½è§†é¢‘
+                   </el-button>
+                   <el-button type="warning" @click="goToMember" v-else>
+                     <el-icon><lock /></el-icon>
+                     å¼€é€šä¼šå‘˜
+                   </el-button>
+                 </div>
+               </div>
+             </div>
+             
+             <div class="video-description">
+               <h2>è¯¾ç¨‹ç®€ä»‹</h2>
+               <p>{{ video?.description }}</p>
+             </div>
+           </el-col>
+           
+           <el-col :span="8">
+             <div class="related-videos">
+               <h2>ç›¸å…³è¯¾ç¨‹</h2>
+               <el-card v-for="item in relatedVideos" :key="item.id" class="related-video-card" @click="goToVideo(item.id)">
+                 <img :src="item.cover" class="related-video-cover">
+                 <div class="related-video-info">
+                   <h3>{{ item.title }}</h3>
+                   <p>{{ item.duration }}</p>
+                 </div>
+               </el-card>
+             </div>
+           </el-col>
+         </el-row>
+       </el-main>
+       
+       <el-footer>
+         <nav-footer />
+       </el-footer>
+     </el-container>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup>
+ import { ref, onMounted, computed } from 'vue'
+ import { useRoute, useRouter } from 'vue-router'
+ import { useVideoStore } from '../stores/video'
+ import { useUserStore } from '../stores/user'
+ import { Star, Download, Lock } from '@element-plus/icons-vue'
+ import NavHeader from '../components/NavHeader.vue'
+ import NavFooter from '../components/NavFooter.vue'
+ import dayjs from 'dayjs'
+ 
+ const route = useRoute()
+ const router = useRouter()
+ const videoStore = useVideoStore()
+ const userStore = useUserStore()
+ 
+ const video = ref(null)
+ const isLiked = ref(false)
+ const relatedVideos = ref([])
+ const playerOptions = ref({
+   autoplay: false,
+   controls: true,
+   sources: [],
+   poster: '',
+   width: '100%',
+   height: '500px'
+ })
+ 
+ const isMember = computed(() => userStore.user?.isMember)
+ 
+ onMounted(async () => {
+   const videoId = route.params.id
+   await loadVideo(videoId)
+   await loadRelatedVideos()
+ })
+ 
+ const loadVideo = async (id) => {
+   const videoData = await videoStore.getVideoById(id)
+   if (videoData) {
+     video.value = videoData
+     playerOptions.value.sources = [{
+       src: videoData.url,
+       type: 'video/mp4'
+     }]
+     playerOptions.value.poster = videoData.cover
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const loadRelatedVideos = async () => {
+   await videoStore.fetchVideos()
+   relatedVideos.value = videoStore.videos.slice(0, 5)
+ }
+ 
+ const onTimeUpdate = (event) => {
+   const currentTime = event.target.currentTime
+   const duration = event.target.duration
+   const progress = (currentTime / duration) * 100
+   
+   if (isMember.value) {
+     videoStore.updateWatchProgress(video.value.id, progress)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const onVideoEnded = () => {
+   if (isMember.value) {
+     videoStore.updateWatchProgress(video.value.id, 100)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const toggleLike = () => {
+   isLiked.value = !isLiked.value
+ }
+ 
+ const downloadVideo = async () => {
+   try {
+     await videoStore.downloadVideo(video.value.id)
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error('ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•')
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const goToVideo = (id) => {
+   router.push(`/video/${id}`)
+ }
+ 
+ const goToMember = () => {
+   router.push('/member')
+ }
+ 
+ const formatDate = (date) => {
+   return dayjs(date).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm')
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .video-detail {
+   min-height: 100vh;
+ }
+ 
+ .video-player {
+   margin-bottom: 20px;
+ }
+ 
+ .video-info {
+   margin: 20px 0;
+ }
+ 
+ .video-info h1 {
+   margin: 0 0 10px 0;
+   font-size: 24px;
+ }
+ 
+ .video-meta {
+   display: flex;
+   gap: 20px;
+   color: #666;
+   margin-bottom: 20px;
+ }
+ 
+ .video-actions {
+   display: flex;
+   gap: 10px;
+ }
+ 
+ .video-description {
+   margin: 20px 0;
+   padding: 20px;
+   background-color: #f5f7fa;
+   border-radius: 4px;
+ }
+ 
+ .video-description h2 {
+   margin: 0 0 10px 0;
+   font-size: 18px;
+ }
+ 
+ .related-videos {
+   position: sticky;
+   top: 20px;
+ }
+ 
+ .related-videos h2 {
+   margin: 0 0 20px 0;
+   font-size: 18px;
+ }
+ 
+ .related-video-card {
+   margin-bottom: 20px;
+   cursor: pointer;
+ }
+ 
+ .related-video-cover {
+   width: 100%;
+   height: 120px;
+   object-fit: cover;
+ }
+ 
+ .related-video-info {
+   padding: 10px;
+ }
+ 
+ .related-video-info h3 {
+   margin: 0 0 5px 0;
+   font-size: 14px;
+ }
+ 
+ .related-video-info p {
+   margin: 0;
+   color: #666;
+   font-size: 12px;
+ }
+ </style> 
```

```diff
+         style="width: 100%"
+         v-loading="loading"
+       >
+         <el-table-column prop="id" label="ID" width="80" />
+         <el-table-column prop="name" label="ç”¨æˆ·å" />
+         <el-table-column prop="email" label="é‚®ç®±" />
+         <el-table-column prop="phone" label="ç”µè¯" />
+         <el-table-column prop="memberId" label="ä¼šå‘˜å·" />
+         <el-table-column prop="isMember" label="ä¼šå‘˜çŠ¶æ€">
+           <template #default="{ row }">
+             <el-tag :type="row.isMember ? 'success' : 'info'">
+               {{ row.isMember ? 'ä¼šå‘˜' : 'éä¼šå‘˜' }}
+             </el-tag>
+           </template>
+         </el-table-column>
+         <el-table-column prop="registerTime" label="æ³¨å†Œæ—¶é—´">
+           <template #default="{ row }">
+             {{ formatDate(row.registerTime) }}
+           </template>
+         </el-table-column>
+         <el-table-column label="æ“ä½œ" width="200">
+           <template #default="{ row }">
+             <el-button type="primary" size="small" @click="editUser(row)">ç¼–è¾‘</el-button>
+             <el-button type="danger" size="small" @click="deleteUser(row)">åˆ é™¤</el-button>
+           </template>
+         </el-table-column>
+       </el-table>
+

+         <el-pagination
+           v-model:current-page="currentPage"

+         />
+       </div>
+     </el-card>
+ 
+     <!-- æ·»åŠ /ç¼–è¾‘ç”¨æˆ·å¯¹è¯æ¡† -->
+     <el-dialog
+       :title="dialogTitle"
+       v-model="dialogVisible"
+       width="500px"
+     >
+       <el-form

+       >

+         </el-form-item>

+           <el-button type="primary" @click="saveUser">ç¡®å®š</el-button>
+         </span>
+       </template>
+     </el-dialog>
+   </div>
+ </template>

+ <script setup>
+ import { ref, computed, onMounted } from 'vue'
+ import { Search } from '@element-plus/icons-vue'
+ import dayjs from 'dayjs'
+ 
+ const loading = ref(false)
+ const searchQuery = ref('')
+ const currentPage = ref(1)
+ const pageSize = ref(10)
+ const total = ref(100)
+ const dialogVisible = ref(false)
+ const dialogTitle = ref('æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ·')
+ const userForm = ref({
+   name: '',
+   email: '',
+   phone: '',
+   idCard: '',
+   isMember: false,
+   memberId: ''
+ })
+ 
+ const rules = {
+   name: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   email: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥é‚®ç®±', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { type: 'email', message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„é‚®ç®±æ ¼å¼', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   phone: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”µè¯', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { pattern: /^1[3-9]\d{9}$/, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„æ‰‹æœºå·', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   idCard: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥èº«ä»½è¯å·', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { pattern: /(^\d{15}$)|(^\d{18}$)|(^\d{17}(\d|X|x)$)/, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„èº«ä»½è¯å·', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ }
+ 
+ // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®
+ const users = ref([
+   {
+     id: 1,
+     name: 'å¼ ä¸‰',
+     email: 'zhangsan@example.com',
+     phone: '13800138000',
+     idCard: '110101199001011234',
+     isMember: true,
+     memberId: 'M2024001',
+     registerTime: '2024-04-28 10:00:00'
+   },
+   {
+     id: 2,
+     name: 'æå››',
+     email: 'lisi@example.com',
+     phone: '13800138001',
+     idCard: '110101199001011235',
+     isMember: false,
+     registerTime: '2024-04-28 09:30:00'
+   }
+ ])
+ 
+ const filteredUsers = computed(() => {
+   return users.value.filter(user => {
+     const query = searchQuery.value.toLowerCase()
+     return (
+       user.name.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
+       user.email.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
+       user.phone.includes(query) ||
+       user.memberId?.toLowerCase().includes(query)
+     )
+   })
+ })
+ 
+ const showAddDialog = () => {
+   dialogTitle.value = 'æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ·'
+   userForm.value = {
+     name: '',
+     email: '',
+     phone: '',
+     idCard: '',
+     isMember: false,
+     memberId: ''
+   }
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ const editUser = (row) => {
+   dialogTitle.value = 'ç¼–è¾‘ç”¨æˆ·'
+   userForm.value = { ...row }
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ const deleteUser = async (row) => {
+   try {
+     await ElMessageBox.confirm('ç¡®å®šè¦åˆ é™¤è¯¥ç”¨æˆ·å—ï¼Ÿ', 'æç¤º', {
+       type: 'warning'
+     })
+     // TODO: è°ƒç”¨åˆ é™¤ç”¨æˆ·API
+     ElMessage.success('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ')
+   } catch (error) {
+     if (error !== 'cancel') {
+       ElMessage.error('åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥')
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const saveUser = async () => {
+   try {
+     // TODO: è°ƒç”¨ä¿å­˜ç”¨æˆ·API
+     ElMessage.success('ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ')
+     dialogVisible.value = false
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error('ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥')
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const handleSizeChange = (val) => {
+   pageSize.value = val
+   // TODO: é‡æ–°åŠ è½½æ•°æ®
+ }
+ 
+ const handleCurrentChange = (val) => {
+   currentPage.value = val
+   // TODO: é‡æ–°åŠ è½½æ•°æ®
+ }
+ 
+ const formatDate = (date) => {
+   return dayjs(date).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm')
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .user-management {
+   padding: 20px;
+ }
+ 
+ .card-header {
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: space-between;
+   align-items: center;
+ }
+ 
+ .header-actions {
+   display: flex;
+   gap: 10px;
+ }
+ 
+ .search-input {
+   width: 200px;
+ }
+ 
+ .pagination {
+   margin-top: 20px;
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: flex-end;
+ }
+ </style>
```

```diff
+ const loginForm = ref({
+   username: '',
+   password: ''

+ const loading = ref(false)
+ const rememberMe = ref(false)

+   loading.value = true

+     const success = await userStore.login({

+       password: loginForm.value.password,
+       remember: rememberMe.value

+     }
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error('ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥ï¼š' + error.message)
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const forgotPassword = () => {
+   // TODO: å®ç°å¿˜è®°å¯†ç åŠŸèƒ½
+   ElMessage.info('å¿˜è®°å¯†ç åŠŸèƒ½å¼€å‘ä¸­')
```

```diff
+ <script setup>

+ import { useRouter } from 'vue-router'
+ import { useUserStore } from '../stores/user'
+ import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
+ 
+ const router = useRouter()
+ const userStore = useUserStore()
+ 
+ const registerForm = ref({
+   username: '',
+   email: '',
+   phone: '',
+   password: '',
+   confirmPassword: ''
+ })
+ 
+ const loading = ref(false)
+ 
+ const validatePass = (rule, value, callback) => {
+   if (value === '') {
+     callback(new Error('è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç '))
+   } else {
+     if (registerForm.value.confirmPassword !== '') {
+       registerForm.value.confirmPassword = ''
+     }
+     callback()
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const validatePass2 = (rule, value, callback) => {
+   if (value === '') {
+     callback(new Error('è¯·å†æ¬¡è¾“å…¥å¯†ç '))
+   } else if (value !== registerForm.value.password) {
+     callback(new Error('ä¸¤æ¬¡è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ä¸ä¸€è‡´!'))
+   } else {
+     callback()
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const rules = {
+   username: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 3, max: 20, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 3 åˆ° 20 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   email: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥é‚®ç®±åœ°å€', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { type: 'email', message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„é‚®ç®±åœ°å€', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   phone: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ‰‹æœºå·', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { pattern: /^1[3-9]\d{9}$/, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„æ‰‹æœºå·', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   password: [
+     { required: true, validator: validatePass, trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 6, message: 'å¯†ç é•¿åº¦ä¸èƒ½å°äº6ä½', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   confirmPassword: [
+     { required: true, validator: validatePass2, trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ }
+ 
+ const handleRegister = async () => {
+   loading.value = true
+   try {
+     await userStore.register({
+       username: registerForm.value.username,
+       email: registerForm.value.email,
+       phone: registerForm.value.phone,
+       password: registerForm.value.password
+     })
+     
+     ElMessage.success('æ³¨å†ŒæˆåŠŸï¼Œè¯·ç™»å½•')

+   } finally {

+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const goToLogin = () => {
+   router.push('/login')
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .register-container {
```

```diff
+               <span>è§†é¢‘è§‚çœ‹åˆ†å¸ƒ</span>

+             <el-button @click="refreshData">åˆ·æ–°</el-button>
+           </el-button-group>
+         </div>
+       </template>
+       
+       <el-table :data="tableData" style="width: 100%" v-loading="loading">

+         <el-table-column prop="newUsers" label="æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·" />

+         </el-table-column>
+       </el-table>

+         />

+     </el-card>

+ <script setup>

+ const pageSize = ref(10)
+ const total = ref(0)
```
